sourceMeaningMnemonic: There’s a <radical>cross</radical> in your <radical>mouth</radical>, so the things you say are very pious. Everything you say, you <kanji>say humbly</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine yourself with a cross in your mouth, saying all kinds of humble things. "Oh no, I'm not that good." "Oh no, my mustache doesn't look that great."
readingMnemonic: As you're saying all these humble things, you're also <reading>mow</reading>ing your neighbor's lawn. Your neighbors love you so much, because you're so humble, and you mow their lawn for them.
readingInfo: Imagine mowing your neighbor's lawn while you say humbly how bad you are at mowing lawns. What a good neighbor you are.
